text: @UN @firstdraftnews #Coronavirus patients at present rapidly increasing in India. @PMOIndia @narendramodi and all states governments in India are failing to handle, spread and growth of #Covid19 in India. @WHO @DrTedros @BBCWorld @cnni @FoxNews @SkyNews @euronews @AJEnglish @ndtv @trtworld @AP

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
